text.div:
Properties

CodeURLTypeDescription
statushttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#statuscodeStatus of the concept
deprecatedhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/utg-concept-properties#v2-table-deprecatedcodeVersion of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0205 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
AP administrative price or handling feeadministrative price or handling fee
DC direct unit costdirect unit cost
IC indirect unit costindirect unit cost
PF professional fee for performing providerprofessional fee for performing provider
TF technology fee for use of equipmenttechnology fee for use of equipment
TP total pricetotal price
UP unit price, may be based on length of procedure or serviceunit price, may be based on length of procedure or service

name: PriceType
title: priceType
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts used to identify the intent for the dollar amount on a pricing transaction.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the CP datatype.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0205 (Price Type)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

concept.definition: technology fee for use of equipment

concept.definition: unit price, may be based on length of procedure or service
